alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Northern Cayuga; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Lewis, Cayuga and Oswego Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Jordan, or near Baldwinsville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Oswego, Fulton, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Pulaski, Central Square, Weedsport, Redfield, Cato, Selkirk Shores State Park, Highmarket, Mexico Point State Park, Nine Mile Point, Battle Island State Park, Hastings, Scriba, Volney, Richland, Constantia, West Monroe and Palermo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 40. Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
